featured.text: Given the variations in preferences, new studies have started to untangle the benefits and risks of horror movies.
This north-south preference has also been noted in flies, termites and honeybees.
Kids are tuned into their parents’ eating preferences and are far more likely to try foods if they see their mother or father eating them.
Each country has its unique naming preferences.

other.text: Today, people go with different colors depending upon their preferences.
Some cultures are found to show preference for dimples on one’s cheeks, as the feature is claimed to be a sign of 32 .

definition.zh_def: 偏好；優先選擇的事物或人
definition.en_def: A greater liking for one alternative over another or others.
definition.example: Her preference for chocolate over vanilla is well known.
